Property.Name: DefaultExpressionScript
Property.Value: (getdate())

Property.Name: DefaultExpressionScript
Property.Value: (getdate())

Property.Name: DefaultExpressionScript
Property.Value: (getdate())

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value:
Begin Declare @gender varchar(10); If @input = 1 Begin Set @gender = 'Male' End
Else
Begin Set @gender = 'Female'; End
Return @gender End

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE Function [dbo].[fn_Cinsiyet](@input int) Returns varchar(50) As

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: Begin Select d.departman_ad As 'Department', AVG(c.calisan_maas) As 'Average Salary' From Calisanlar c Inner join Departmanlar d On d.departman_id = c.departman_ID Group By d.departman_ad Having AVG(c.calisan_maas) > 5200 Order By 'Average Salary' Desc End

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE Procedure sp_AnalizMaas As

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: Begin Select c.calisan_ad As 'Employee Name', c.calisan_maas As 'Salary' From Calisanlar c Inner join Egitim e on e.egitim_id = c.egitim_ID Where c.calisan_maas > 5000 and e.egitim_durum = 'Bachelor' End

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE Procedure sp_AnalizMaasEgitim As

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value:
Begin
Select c.calisan_id As 'Employee ID', c.calisan_ad As 'Name', c.calisan_soyad As 'Surname', c.calisan_yas As 'Age', c.calisan_maas As 'Salary', m.memleket_ad As 'Homeland', d.departman_ad As 'Department', e.egitim_durum As 'Education' From Calisanlar c Inner join Memleketler m On m.memleket_id = c.memleket_ID Inner join Departmanlar d On d.departman_id = c.departman_ID Inner join Egitim e On e.egitim_id = c.egitim_ID Where c.calisan_id = @calisan_id
End

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
Begin
Declare @calisan_ad_yeni varchar(50) = Upper(Left(@calisan_ad,1)) + Lower(Right(@calisan_ad,len(@calisan_ad)-1)) Declare @calisan_soyad_yeni varchar(50) = Upper(Left(@calisan_soyad,1)) + Lower(Right(@calisan_soyad,len(@calisan_soyad)-1))
Insert Into Calisanlar (calisan_ad,calisan_soyad,calisan_yas,calisan_cinsiyet,calisan_maas,memleket_ID,departman_ID,egitim_ID) Values (@calisan_ad_yeni, @calisan_soyad_yeni,@calisan_yas, @calisan_cinsiyet,@calisan_maas, @memleket_id,@departman_id,@egitim_id)
Insert Into Islemlog (kullanici_ad,sayfa_ad,islem_ad,islem_log) Values (@kullanici_ad,'Employees','Hire','Hired Employee: ' + @calisan_ad_yeni + ' ' + @calisan_soyad) Select * From Islemlog
End

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
Begin Select c.calisan_id As 'Employee ID', c.calisan_ad As 'Name', c.calisan_soyad As 'Surname', c.calisan_yas As 'Age', dbo.[fn_Cinsiyet](c.calisan_cinsiyet) As 'Gender', c.calisan_maas As 'Salary', m.memleket_ad As 'Homeland', d.departman_ad As 'Department', e.egitim_durum As 'Education' From Calisanlar c Inner join Memleketler m On m.memleket_id = c.memleket_ID Inner join Departmanlar d On d.departman_id = c.departman_ID Inner join Egitim e On e.egitim_id = c.egitim_ID
End

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE procedure [dbo].[sp_CalisanGoster] As

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value:
Begin
Declare @calisan_ad_yeni varchar(50) = Upper(Left(@calisan_ad,1)) + Lower(Right(@calisan_ad,len(@calisan_ad)-1)) Declare @calisan_soyad_yeni varchar(50) = Upper(Left(@calisan_soyad,1)) + Lower(Right(@calisan_soyad,len(@calisan_soyad)-1))
Update Calisanlar Set calisan_ad = @calisan_ad, calisan_soyad = @calisan_soyad_yeni, calisan_yas = @calisan_yas, calisan_cinsiyet = @calisan_cinsiyet, calisan_maas = @calisan_maas, memleket_ID = @memleket_id, departman_ID = @departman_id, egitim_ID = @egitim_id Where calisan_id = @calisan_id
Insert Into Islemlog (kullanici_ad,sayfa_ad,islem_ad,islem_log) Values (@kullanici_ad,'Employees','Update','Updated Employee: ' + @calisan_ad_yeni + ' ' + @calisan_soyad_yeni) Select * From Islemlog
End

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
Begin
Declare @calisan_ad varchar(50) Declare @calisan_soyad varchar(50) Select @calisan_ad = calisan_ad, @calisan_soyad = calisan_soyad From Calisanlar where calisan_id = @calisan_id
Delete From Calisanlar Where calisan_id = @calisan_id
Insert Into Islemlog (kullanici_ad,sayfa_ad,islem_ad,islem_log) Values (@kullanici_ad,'Employees','Delete','Deleted Employee: ' + @calisan_ad + ' ' + @calisan_soyad) Select * From Islemlog
End

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: Begin Select d.departman_ad As 'Department', COUNT(*) As 'Employee Count' From Calisanlar c Inner join Departmanlar d On d.departman_id = c.departman_ID Group By d.departman_ad Having COUNT(*) >= 2 Order By COUNT(*) Desc End

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE Procedure [dbo].[sp_DepartmanCalisanAdet] As

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value:
Begin
Declare @departman_ad_yeni varchar(50) = Upper(Left(@departman_ad,1)) + Lower(Right(@departman_ad,len(@departman_ad)-1))
Insert Into Departmanlar(departman_ad) Values(@departman_ad_yeni)
Insert Into Islemlog (kullanici_ad,sayfa_ad,islem_ad,islem_log) Values (@kullanici_ad,'Department','Add','Added Department: ' + @departman_ad) Select * From Islemlog End

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
Begin
Select departman_id As 'Department ID', departman_ad As 'Department' From Departmanlar
End

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: Create Procedure sp_DepartmanGoster As

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value:
Begin
Declare @departman_ad_yeni varchar(50) = Upper(Left(@departman_ad,1)) + Lower(Right(@departman_ad,len(@departman_ad)-1))
Update Departmanlar Set departman_ad = @departman_ad_yeni Where departman_id = @departman_id
Insert Into Islemlog (kullanici_ad,sayfa_ad,islem_ad,islem_log) Values (@kullanici_ad,'Department','Update','Updated Department: ' + @departman_ad_yeni) Select * From Islemlog
End

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
Begin
Declare @departman_ad varchar(50) Select @departman_ad = departman_ad From Departmanlar where departman_id = @departman_id
Delete from Departmanlar Where departman_id = @departman_id
Insert Into Islemlog (kullanici_ad,sayfa_ad,islem_ad,islem_log) Values (@kullanici_ad,'Department','Delete','Deleted Department: ' + @departman_ad) Select * From Islemlog
End

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
Begin
Declare @egitim_durum_yeni varchar(50) = Upper(Left(@egitim_durum,1)) + Lower(Right(@egitim_durum,len(@egitim_durum)-1))
Insert Into Egitim(egitim_durum) Values(@egitim_durum_yeni)
Insert Into Islemlog (kullanici_ad,sayfa_ad,islem_ad,islem_log) Values (@kullanici_ad,'Education','Add','Added Education Status: ' + @egitim_durum_yeni) Select * From Islemlog
End

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
Begin
Select egitim_id As 'Education ID', egitim_durum As 'Education' From Egitim
End

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: Create Procedure sp_EgitimGoster As

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value:
Begin
Declare @egitim_durum_yeni varchar(50) = Upper(Left(@egitim_durum,1)) + Lower(Right(@egitim_durum,len(@egitim_durum)-1))
Update Egitim Set egitim_durum = @egitim_durum_yeni Where egitim_id = @egitim_id
Insert Into Islemlog (kullanici_ad,sayfa_ad,islem_ad,islem_log) Values (@kullanici_ad,'Education','Update','Updated Education Status: ' + @egitim_durum_yeni) Select * From Islemlog
End

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
Begin
Declare @egitim_durumu varchar(50) Select @egitim_durumu = egitim_durum From Egitim Where egitim_id = @egitim_id
Delete From Egitim Where egitim_id = @egitim_id
Insert Into Islemlog (kullanici_ad,sayfa_ad,islem_ad,islem_log) Values (@kullanici_ad,'Education','Delete','Deleted Education Status: ' + @egitim_durumu) Select * From Islemlog
End

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
Begin
Select * From Kullanicilar k Inner join Calisanlar c On c.calisan_id = k.calisan_ID Where kullanici_ad = @kullanici_ad And kullanici_sifre = @kullanici_sifre
/* If exists(Select * From Kullanicilar Where kullanici_ad = @kullanici_ad and kullanici_sifre = @kullanici_sifre) Begin Select * From Kullanicilar Where kullanici_ad = @kullanici_ad And kullanici_sifre = @kullanici_sifre End
Else Begin Raiserror('Wrong username or password.',16,1) End */ End

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
Begin
Select islemlog_id As 'Log ID', kullanici_ad As 'Active User', sayfa_ad As 'Page', islem_ad As 'Process', islem_log As 'Process Log', islem_tarih As 'Process Date' From IslemLog Order By islem_tarih Desc
End

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE Procedure [dbo].[sp_IslemLogGoster] As

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value:
Begin
If EXISTS (Select 1 From Kullanicilar Where calisan_ID = @calisan_ID) Begin
Raiserror('Belirtilen calisan_ID''ye sahip bir kullanici zaten var.', 16, 1) End Else Begin
Insert Into Kullanicilar (calisan_ID, kullanici_ad, kullanici_sifre, kullanici_guvenlik, calisanlar, sehirUlke, departmanlar, egitim, musteriler, satislar, urunler, stoklar, tedarik, kullanicilar) Values (@calisan_ID, @kullanici_ad, @kullanici_sifre, @kullanici_guvenlik, @calisanlar, @sehirUlke, @departmanlar, @egitim, @musteriler, @satislar, @urunler, @stoklar, @tedarik, @kullanicilar)
Insert Into Islemlog (kullanici_ad,sayfa_ad,islem_ad,islem_log) Values (@islemi_yapan_kullanici_ad,'Users','Add','Added User: ' + @kullanici_ad) Select * From Islemlog End
End

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
Begin
Select k.kullanici_id As 'User ID', c.calisan_ad As 'Employee', k.kullanici_ad As 'Username', k.kullanici_sifre As 'Password', k.kullanici_guvenlik As 'Security Question', k.calisanlar As 'Employees', k.sehirUlke As 'City & Country', k.departmanlar As 'Department', k.egitim As 'Education', k.musteriler As 'Customers', k.satislar As 'Sales', k.urunler As 'Products', k.stoklar As 'Warehouse', k.tedarik As 'Supply', k.kullanicilar As 'Users' From Kullanicilar k Inner join Calisanlar c On c.calisan_id = k.calisan_ID
End

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: Create Procedure sp_KullaniciGoster As

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value:
Begin Update Kullanicilar Set calisan_ID = @calisan_ID, kullanici_ad = @kullanici_ad, kullanici_sifre = @kullanici_sifre, kullanici_guvenlik = @kullanici_guvenlik, calisanlar = @calisanlar, sehirUlke = @sehirUlke, departmanlar = @departmanlar, egitim = @egitim, musteriler = @musteriler, satislar = @satislar, urunler = @urunler, stoklar = @stoklar, tedarik = @tedarik, kullanicilar = @kullanicilar Where kullanici_id = @kullanici_id;
Insert Into Islemlog (kullanici_ad,sayfa_ad,islem_ad,islem_log) Values (@islemi_yapan_kullanici_ad,'Users','Update','Updated User: ' + @kullanici_ad) Select * From Islemlog End

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
Begin
Declare @kullanici_ad varchar(50) Select @kullanici_ad = kullanici_ad From Kullanicilar where kullanici_id = @kullanici_id
Delete From Kullanicilar Where kullanici_id = @kullanici_id
Insert Into Islemlog (kullanici_ad,sayfa_ad,islem_ad,islem_log) Values (@islemi_yapan_kullanici_ad,'Users','Delete','Deleted User: ' + @kullanici_ad) Select * From Islemlog
End

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: Begin SELECT TOP 3 c.calisan_ad AS 'Salesman', SUM(u.urun_fiyat*s.urun_miktari) AS 'Ciro ($)' FROM Satislar s INNER JOIN Urunler u ON u.urun_id = s.urun_ID INNER JOIN Calisanlar c ON c.calisan_id = s.calisan_ID Group By c.calisan_ad Order by 'Ciro ($)' Desc End

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE Procedure [dbo].[sp_MaxSatisGoster] As

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value:
Begin
Declare @memleket_ad_yeni varchar(50) = Upper(Left(@memleket_ad,1)) + Lower(Right(@memleket_ad,len(@memleket_ad)-1))
Insert Into Memleketler (memleket_ad,ulke_ID) Values (@memleket_ad_yeni, @ulke_id)
Insert Into Islemlog (kullanici_ad,sayfa_ad,islem_ad,islem_log) Values (@kullanici_ad,'Homeland','Add','Added Homeland: ' + @memleket_ad) Select * From Islemlog
End

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
Begin
Select m.memleket_id As 'City ID', m.memleket_ad As 'City', u.ulke_ad As 'Country' From Memleketler m Inner join Ulkeler u On u.ulke_id = m.ulke_ID
End

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: Create Procedure sp_MemleketGoster As

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value:
Begin
Declare @memleket_ad_yeni varchar(50) = Upper(Left(@memleket_ad,1)) + Lower(Right(@memleket_ad,len(@memleket_ad)-1))
Update Memleketler Set memleket_ad = @memleket_ad_yeni, ulke_ID = @ulke_id Where memleket_id = @memleket_id
Insert Into Islemlog (kullanici_ad,sayfa_ad,islem_ad,islem_log) Values (@kullanici_ad,'Homeland','Update','Updated Homeland: ' + @memleket_ad_yeni) Select * From Islemlog
End

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
Begin
Declare @memleket_ad varchar(50) Select @memleket_ad = memleket_ad From Memleketler where memleket_id = @memleket_id
Delete From Memleketler Where memleket_id = @memleket_id
Insert Into Islemlog (kullanici_ad,sayfa_ad,islem_ad,islem_log) Values (@kullanici_ad,'Homeland','Delete','Deleted Homeland: ' + @memleket_ad) Select * From Islemlog
End

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
Begin
Declare @musteri_ad_yeni varchar(50) = Upper(Left(@musteri_ad,1)) + Lower(Right(@musteri_ad,len(@musteri_ad)-1)) Declare @musteri_soyad_yeni varchar(50) = Upper(Left(@musteri_soyad,1)) + Lower(Right(@musteri_soyad,len(@musteri_soyad)-1))
Insert Into Musteriler (musteri_ad, musteri_soyad, musteri_mail, musteri_telefon, musteri_adres, memleket_ID) Values (@musteri_ad_yeni, @musteri_soyad_yeni, @musteri_mail, @musteri_telefon, @musteri_adres, @memleket_ID)
Insert Into Islemlog (kullanici_ad,sayfa_ad,islem_ad,islem_log) Values (@kullanici_ad,'Customers','Add','Added Customer: ' + @musteri_mail) Select * From Islemlog
End

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
Begin Select m.musteri_id As 'Customer ID', m.musteri_ad As 'Name', m.musteri_soyad As 'Surname', m.musteri_mail As 'E-Mail', m.musteri_telefon As 'Cell Phone', m.musteri_adres As 'Address', mem.memleket_ad As 'City'
From Musteriler m Inner join Memleketler mem On m.memleket_ID = mem.memleket_id
End

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: Create Procedure sp_MusteriGoster As

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value:
Begin
Declare @musteri_ad_yeni varchar(50) = Upper(Left(@musteri_ad,1)) + Lower(Right(@musteri_ad,len(@musteri_ad)-1)) Declare @musteri_soyad_yeni varchar(50) = Upper(Left(@musteri_soyad,1)) + Lower(Right(@musteri_soyad,len(@musteri_soyad)-1))
Update Musteriler Set musteri_ad = @musteri_ad_yeni, musteri_soyad = @musteri_soyad_yeni, musteri_mail = @musteri_mail, musteri_telefon = @musteri_telefon, musteri_adres = @musteri_adres, memleket_ID = @memleket_ID Where musteri_id = @musteri_id
Insert Into Islemlog (kullanici_ad,sayfa_ad,islem_ad,islem_log) Values (@kullanici_ad,'Customers','Update','Updated Customer: ' + @musteri_mail) Select * From Islemlog
End

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
Begin
Declare @musteri_mail varchar(50)
Select @musteri_mail = musteri_mail From Musteriler Where musteri_id = @musteri_id
Delete From Musteriler Where musteri_id = @musteri_id
Insert Into Islemlog (kullanici_ad,sayfa_ad,islem_ad,islem_log) Values (@kullanici_ad,'Customers','Delete','Deleted Customer: ' + @musteri_mail) Select * From Islemlog
End

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
Begin
If((Select stok_adet From Stoklar where urun_ID = @urun_ID) >= @urun_miktari) Begin Insert Into Satislar(calisan_ID, musteri_ID, urun_ID, urun_miktari) Values (@calisan_ID, @musteri_ID, @urun_ID, @urun_miktari)
Update Stoklar Set stok_adet = stok_adet - @urun_miktari Where urun_ID = @urun_ID
Insert Into Islemlog (kullanici_ad,sayfa_ad,islem_ad,islem_log) Values (@kullanici_ad,'Sales','Add','Made Sale' ) Select * From Islemlog End
Else Begin RaisError('There is not enough quantity in stock.',16,1) End
End

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
Begin
Select satis_id As 'Sales ID', c.calisan_ad /*+ ' ' + c.calisan_soyad */ As 'Employee', m.musteri_ad /*+ ' ' + m.musteri_soyad */ As 'Customer', u.urun_ad As 'Product', urun_miktari As 'Quantity', satis_tarihi As 'Sales Date' From Satislar s Inner join Calisanlar c On c.calisan_id = s.calisan_ID Inner join Musteriler m On m.musteri_id = s.musteri_ID Inner join Urunler u On u.urun_id = s.urun_ID
End

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE Procedure [dbo].[sp_SatisGoster] As

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value:
Begin
If((Select stok_adet From Stoklar where urun_ID = @urun_ID) >= @urun_miktari) Begin
Update Stoklar Set stok_adet = stok_adet - @urun_miktari Where urun_ID = @urun_ID
Update Satislar Set urun_miktari += @urun_miktari Where satis_id = @satis_id
Insert Into Islemlog (kullanici_ad,sayfa_ad,islem_ad,islem_log) Values (@kullanici_ad,'Sales','Update','Sale Updated' ) Select * From Islemlog End
Else Begin RaisError('There is not enough quantity in stock.',16,1) End
End

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
Begin
Select stok_adet From Stoklar where urun_ID = @urun_ID
Update Stoklar Set stok_adet += @urun_miktari Where urun_ID = @urun_ID
Delete From Satislar Where satis_id = @satis_id
Insert Into Islemlog (kullanici_ad,sayfa_ad,islem_ad,islem_log) Values (@kullanici_ad,'Sales','Delete','Sale Deleted' ) Select * From Islemlog
End

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
Begin
If Exists(Select * From Kullanicilar Where kullanici_ad = @kullanici_ad and kullanici_guvenlik = @kullanici_guvenlik) Begin Update Kullanicilar Set kullanici_sifre = @kullanici_sifre Where kullanici_ad = @kullanici_ad and kullanici_guvenlik = @kullanici_guvenlik End Else Begin Raiserror('Wrong username or security question!',16,1) End
End

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
Begin
Select u.urun_id As 'Product ID', u.urun_ad As 'Product', u.urun_ebat As 'Product Size', s.stok_adet As 'Stock Quantity'
From Stoklar s Inner join Urunler u On u.urun_id = s.urun_ID
End

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE Procedure sp_StokGoster As

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value:
Begin
Update Stoklar Set stok_adet = @stok_adet Where stok_id = @stok_id
End

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
Begin
Declare @urun_ad2 varchar(50) Select @urun_ad2 = urun_ad From Urunler where @urun_ID = urun_id
Declare @stok_adet_eski int Select @stok_adet_eski = stok_adet From Stoklar where urun_ID = @urun_ID
If @stok_adet_eski IS NOT NULL Begin Update Stoklar Set stok_adet += @tedarik_miktari Where urun_ID = @urun_ID End
Else Begin
Insert Into Stoklar (urun_ID, stok_adet) Values (@urun_ID, @tedarik_miktari)
End
Insert Into Islemlog (kullanici_ad,sayfa_ad,islem_ad,islem_log) Values (@kullanici_ad,'Supply','Add','Supply Added to the Warehouse') Select * From Islemlog
End

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
Begin
Declare @ulke_ad_yeni varchar(50) = Upper(Left(@ulke_ad,1)) + Lower(Right(@ulke_ad,len(@ulke_ad)-1))
Insert Into Ulkeler (ulke_ad) Values (@ulke_ad_yeni)
Insert Into Islemlog (kullanici_ad,sayfa_ad,islem_ad,islem_log) Values (@kullanici_ad,'Country','Add','Added Country: ' + @ulke_ad) Select * From Islemlog
End

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
Begin
Select ulke_id As 'Country ID', ulke_ad As 'Country' From Ulkeler
End

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: Create Procedure sp_UlkeGoster As

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value:
Begin
Declare @ulke_ad_yeni varchar(50) = Upper(Left(@ulke_ad,1)) + Lower(Right(@ulke_ad,len(@ulke_ad)-1))
Update Ulkeler Set ulke_ad = @ulke_ad_yeni Where ulke_id = @ulke_id
Insert Into Islemlog (kullanici_ad,sayfa_ad,islem_ad,islem_log) Values (@kullanici_ad,'Country','Update','Updated Country: ' + @ulke_ad) Select * From Islemlog
End

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
Begin
Declare @ulke_ad varchar(50) Select @ulke_ad = ulke_ad From Ulkeler Where ulke_id = @ulke_id
Delete From Ulkeler where ulke_id = @ulke_id
Insert Into Islemlog (kullanici_ad,sayfa_ad,islem_ad,islem_log) Values (@kullanici_ad,'Country','Delete','Deleted Country: ' + @ulke_ad) Select * From Islemlog
End

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
Begin
Declare @urun_ad_yeni varchar(50) = Upper(Left(@urun_ad,1)) + Lower(Right(@urun_ad,len(@urun_ad)-1)) --Declare @urun_aciklama_yeni varchar(50) = Upper(Left(@urun_aciklama,1)) + Lower(Right(@urun_aciklama,len(@urun_aciklama)-1))
Insert Into Urunler (urun_ad, urun_ebat, urun_aciklama, urun_fiyat) Values (@urun_ad_yeni, @urun_ebat, @urun_aciklama, @urun_fiyat)
Insert Into Islemlog (kullanici_ad,sayfa_ad,islem_ad,islem_log) Values (@kullanici_ad,'Products','Add','Added Product: ' + @urun_ad_yeni) Select * From Islemlog
End

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: Begin Select urun_id As 'Product ID', urun_ad As 'Product', urun_ebat As 'Product Size', urun_aciklama As 'Product Description', urun_fiyat As 'Price' From Urunler Order by urun_ad End

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE Procedure [dbo].[sp_UrunGoster] As

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value:
Begin
Declare @urun_ad_yeni varchar(50) = Upper(Left(@urun_ad,1)) + Lower(Right(@urun_ad,len(@urun_ad)-1))
Update Urunler Set urun_ad = @urun_ad_yeni, urun_ebat = @urun_ebat, urun_aciklama = @urun_aciklama, urun_fiyat = @urun_fiyat Where urun_id = @urun_id
Insert Into Islemlog (kullanici_ad,sayfa_ad,islem_ad,islem_log) Values (@kullanici_ad,'Products','Update','Updated Product: ' + @urun_ad) Select * From Islemlog
End

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
Begin
Declare @product_name varchar(50) Select @product_name = urun_ad From Urunler Where urun_id = @urun_id
Delete From Urunler Where urun_id = @urun_id
Insert Into Islemlog (kullanici_ad,sayfa_ad,islem_ad,islem_log) Values (@kullanici_ad,'Products','Delete','Deleted Product: ' + @product_name) Select * From Islemlog
End

Property.Name: HeaderContents
QueryScript
Property.Value: Select c.calisan_id As 'Employee ID', c.calisan_ad As 'Name', c.calisan_soyad As 'Surname', c.calisan_yas As 'Age', dbo.[fn_Cinsiyet](c.calisan_cinsiyet) As 'Gender', c.calisan_maas As 'Salary', m.memleket_ad As 'Homeland', d.departman_ad As 'Department', e.egitim_durum As 'Education' From Calisanlar c Inner join Memleketler m On m.memleket_id = c.memleket_ID Inner join Departmanlar d On d.departman_id = c.departman_ID Inner join Egitim e On e.egitim_id = c.egitim_ID

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE View ViewCalisanlar As
